summary: Adds a little dwarven/underground player home.
descriptionHtml:
The progress on this mod will be slow, because i am working on another player home at the moment.

WARNING!!!!!!!!!!!!!
The Weapon racks are defective, so the weapons \"stick\" to them.
DO NOT USE!
i am working to resolve that issue.

[b][i]Please report any errors.[/i][/b]

[b]UPDATE[/b]
The bookshelves still seem to be out of order, but i think the mannequins are working.

[b][i]WARNING[/i][/b]
If you update, you should remove your belongings from the containers, because i dont know if they will be safe.

I\'m rather new to modding, so there could be many errors, but i try my best to test my files.
This mod is NOT finished, i just tried to upload my progress. 

[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]
The mod adds a rather immersive player home that is about twice as big as the house in Markarth.

[b]INSTALLATION[/b]
Just activate the .esp!

[b]KNOWN ERRORS[/b]
None.

[b]CONFLICTS WITH OTHER MODS[/b]
There shouldn\'t be any errors, except if they alter the land I placed the entrance.

[b]LOCATION[/b]
Near Winterhold.

[b]PLANNED[/b]
-(DONE) Make the Lab look a little more chaotic(like a mad scientist housed there).
-(DONE) A second entrance w/ map marker.
-(DONE) Add mannequins.
-(DONE)Add weapon plaques and racks.
-Add potion racks.
-Make the shelves in the reading area into bookshelves.



[b]Suggestions are always welcome.[/b]
author: Vollchaot

files.name: Ice Cave Home 0_15
files.changelogHtml:
Added little \"ramps\" on the transitions from hallway to icecave.
Added a map marker.
Worked on the lab to make it a little more chaotic.

files.name: Ice Cave Home 0_2
files.changelogHtml:
Added flower pots to the main hall.
Added a large hall w/ dead dwarven automatons.
Refined NavMesh.

files.name: Ice Cave Home 0_25
files.changelogHtml:
Changed room order.
Renewed navmesh.
Added a room for mannequins and weapon racks/plaques.
Added bookshelf to the reading area.

files.name: Ice Cave Home
files.changelogHtml:
Added weapon racks.
Fixed the lamp in the hallway to the bedroom.
Added chests to the entrance.
Added chests to the pillar in the mannequin room.
Worked on the navmesh.
